issues.description: The problem statement and template specify a method named singFarmSong(), but the solution implements and documents the method as playFarmSong() instead of singFarmSong(), causing a signature mismatch and preventing the intended method from being called as specified.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution’s method playFarmSong() (and its JavaDoc) in Farm.java to singFarmSong(), and update any calls (e.g., in Main) accordingly to align with the exercise specification.

issues.description: The problem statement and template define a Farm class method named singFarmSong(), but the solution implementation names this method playFarmSong(), breaking the expected one‐to‐one mapping for students.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution’s playFarmSong() method to singFarmSong() so it matches the problem statement and template.
